data.content:
Fissuras são pequenas imperfeições em superfícies, que podem surgir devido a diferentes fatores, como movimentação estrutural, tensões térmicas e hidrostáticas. They can lead to cracks and damage. 

Do the image you sent, the figure C.1 illustrates the position of the most probable location of fissures, which is typically the interface between the foundation and the reinforcement of the slab. 

Would you like me to elaborate on any of these points, or perhaps provide more context?
Okay, I understand. Please proceed with your question.
